s0402.literal: Sixteenth year died, son Duke Hui ascended.
s0402.idiomatic: Sixteenth year died, son Duke Hui ascended.

s0403.literal: Duke Hui twelfth year, son Chu Zi born.
s0403.idiomatic: Duke Hui twelfth year, son Chu Zi born.

s0404.literal: Thirteenth year, attacked Shu, took Nanzheng.
s0404.idiomatic: Thirteenth year, attacked Shu, took Nanzheng.

s0405.literal: Duke Hui died, Chu Zi ascended.
s0405.idiomatic: Duke Hui died, Chu Zi ascended.

s0406.chinese: 出子二年，庶長改迎靈公之子獻公于河西而立之。
s0406.literal: Chu Zi second year, Senior Grand Master Gai welcomed Duke Ling's son Duke Xian from west of Yellow River and established him.
s0406.idiomatic: Chu Zi second year, Senior Grand Master Gai welcomed Duke Ling's son Duke Xian from west of Yellow River and established him.

s0407.chinese: 殺出子及其母，沈之淵旁。
s0407.literal: Killed Chu Zi and his mother, drowned them by the deep pool.
s0407.idiomatic: Killed Chu Zi and his mother, drowned them by the deep pool.

s0408.chinese: 秦以往者數易君，君臣乖亂，故晉復彊，奪秦河西地。
s0408.literal: Qin in past frequently changed rulers, ruler and ministers in disorder, therefore Jin again grew strong, seized Qin's territory west of Yellow River.
s0408.idiomatic: Qin in past frequently changed rulers, ruler and ministers in disorder, therefore Jin again grew strong, seized Qin's territory west of Yellow River.

s0409.literal: Duke Xian first year, stopped accompanying in death.
s0409.idiomatic: Duke Xian first year, stopped accompanying in death.

s0411.literal: Fourth year first month Gengyin day, Duke Xiao born.
s0411.idiomatic: Fourth year first month Gengyin day, Duke Xiao born.

s0412.chinese: 十一年，周太史儋見獻公曰：「周故與秦國合而別，別五百歲復合，合（七）十七歲而霸王出。」
s0412.literal: Eleventh year, Zhou Grand Historian Dan saw Duke Xian, said: 'Zhou originally united with Qin state then separated, separated 500 years will reunite, reunite seventeen years and hegemon king will emerge.'
s0412.idiomatic: Eleventh year, Zhou Grand Historian Dan saw Duke Xian, said: 'Zhou originally united with Qin state then separated, separated 500 years will reunite, reunite seventeen years and hegemon king will emerge.'

s0413.literal: Sixteenth year, peach trees flowered in winter.
s0413.idiomatic: Sixteenth year, peach trees flowered in winter.

s0414.literal: Eighteenth year, rained gold at Yueyang.
s0414.idiomatic: Eighteenth year, rained gold at Yueyang.

s0415.chinese: 二十一年，與晉戰於石門，斬首六萬，天子賀以黼黻。
s0415.literal: Twenty-first year, fought with Jin at Shimen, beheaded 60,000, Son of Heaven congratulated with black and white patterned silk.
s0415.idiomatic: Twenty-first year, fought with Jin at Shimen, beheaded 60,000, Son of Heaven congratulated with black and white patterned silk.

s0416.chinese: 二十三年，與魏晉戰少梁，虜其將公孫痤。
s0416.literal: Twenty-third year, fought with Wei Jin at Shaoliang, captured their general Gongsun Zao.
s0416.idiomatic: Twenty-third year, fought with Wei Jin at Shaoliang, captured their general Gongsun Zao.

s0417.chinese: 二十四年，獻公卒，子孝公立，年已二十一歲矣。
s0417.literal: Twenty-fourth year, Duke Xian died, son Duke Xiao ascended, already twenty-one years old.
s0417.idiomatic: Twenty-fourth year, Duke Xian died, son Duke Xiao ascended, already twenty-one years old.

s0418.chinese: 孝公元年，河山以東彊國六，與齊威、楚宣、魏惠、燕悼、韓哀、趙成侯并。
s0418.literal: Duke Xiao first year, east of rivers and mountains strong states six, with Qi Wei, Chu Xuan, Wei Hui, Yan Dao, Han Ai, Zhao Cheng Hou stood equally.
s0418.idiomatic: Duke Xiao first year, east of rivers and mountains strong states six, with Qi Wei, Chu Xuan, Wei Hui, Yan Dao, Han Ai, Zhao Cheng Hou stood equally.

s0419.literal: Between Huai and Si small states more than ten.
s0419.idiomatic: Between Huai and Si small states more than ten.
